name: runfile.sh
description: Language-agnostic project task runner built on the ubiquitous Make.

scripts.test: npm run -s lint && time bats --jobs 16 --no-parallelize-across-files test.bats
scripts.testf: run() { npm run -s lint && bats -f "$@" test.bats; }; run
scripts.testi: run() { npm run -s lint && bats -f " $( cat test.bats | grep @test | cut -d' ' -f3- | head -$1 | tail -1 | sed 's/" {$//' )$" test.bats; }; run
scripts.testw: run() { npm run -s test; fswatch -0 -o -r . | xargs -0 -n1 npm run test; }; run
scripts.testnw: run() { npm run -s testn; fswatch -0 -o -r . | xargs -0 -n1 npm run testn; }; run
scripts.testfw: run() { npm run -s testf "$@"; fswatch -0 -o -r . | xargs -0 -n1 npm run testf "$@"; }; run
scripts.testiw: run() { npm run -s testi "$@"; fswatch -0 -o -r . | xargs -0 -n1 npm run testi "$@"; }; run
scripts.man:
sed '1,/^Usage$/d' README.md | sed '1s/^/DESCRIPTION
Basic usage:
/' | marked-man --name=runfile.sh | sed -E 's/^(..Brunfile.sh)/\1 – “tmux-execute” – a lightweight tmux command \& layout composer/' | tr '
' '' | sed -E 's/\([^\)]*\)//g' | tr '' '
' > ./man/runfile.sh.1
scripts.release:
npm pack && tar -xvzf *.tgz && rm -rf package *.tgz && echo $'
'"Press ENTER to publish the files above · CTRL+C to cancel · node $( node -v ) · npm $( npm -v )"$'

' && head -n 1 >/dev/null && npm publish
scripts.releasenext:
npm pack && tar -xvzf *.tgz && rm -rf package *.tgz && echo $'
'"Press ENTER to publish the files above (tag=next) · CTRL+C to cancel · node $( node -v ) · npm $( npm -v )"$'

' && head -n 1 >/dev/null && npm publish --tag next
